attributes.action: It is now time from John Bercow to stand down as Speaker .
attributes.background: I voted to remain but accept the decision. John Bercow does not agree with that democratic decision and is not acting on behalf of the electorate, only  to serve himself personally

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP, including the Speaker, would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
